statements: SELECT * FROM tv_show_actors;
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM tv_show_actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM tv_show_actors WHERE role_name = 'Doctor';
SELECT actor_name, biographical_info FROM tv_show_actors ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM tv_show_actors ORDER BY role_name ASC, actor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM tv_show_actors WHERE actor_id = 1 AND role_name = 'Lead Actor'
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM tv_show_actors WHERE actor_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY actor_name ASC
SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM tv_show_actors WHERE role_name = 'Supporting Actor' ORDER BY actor_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(actor_id) AS total_actors, COUNT(DISTINCT role_name) AS total_roles FROM tv_show_actors
SELECT * FROM tv_show_actors WHERE biographical_info IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE show_name = 'Friends' ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, nationality FROM actors WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT actor_id, character_name, show_name FROM roles WHERE role_description LIKE '%supporting role%';
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM actors ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT actor_id, first_name, last_name, show_name FROM actors JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id WHERE roles.character_name = 'Hero';
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE nationality != 'British' AND date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT actor_id, first_name, last_name, show_name, role_description FROM actors JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id ORDER BY actor_id, show_name;
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT actor_name, birthdate FROM actors;
SELECT actor_name, nationality FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT role_name, character_name FROM roles;
SELECT show_name, release_date, average_rating FROM shows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT actor_name, birthdate FROM actors WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, character_name FROM roles WHERE show_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM shows WHERE average_rating > 8.0 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, release_date FROM shows WHERE show_id = (SELECT MAX(show_id) FROM shows);
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT actor_name, age, gender FROM actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT show_name, release_year FROM shows ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT actor_name, show_name FROM actors INNER JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id;
SELECT actor_id, COUNT(role_id) AS num_roles FROM roles GROUP BY actor_id HAVING num_roles > 2;
SELECT * FROM actors ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT actor_name, gender FROM actors WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT actor_name, role_name, show_name FROM actors JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id JOIN shows ON roles.show_id = shows.show_id ORDER BY actor_name ASC;
SELECT actor_name, birth_date, birth_place FROM actors JOIN biography ON actors.actor_id = biography.actor_id WHERE birth_place LIKE 'Los Angeles%' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT actor_name, release_year FROM actors JOIN roles ON actors.actor_id = roles.actor_id JOIN shows ON roles.show_id = shows.show_id WHERE actor_name LIKE 'Tom%' ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT actor_name, birth_date FROM actors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT show_title, release_date FROM tv_shows ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT role_name, show_title, genre FROM roles JOIN tv_shows ON roles.show_id = tv_shows.show_id;
SELECT bio_description FROM biographical_info WHERE actor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM actors ORDER BY actor_name ASC, birth_date DESC;
SELECT show_title, release_date, genre FROM tv_shows WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT actor_name, birth_date, nationality, bio_description FROM actors JOIN biographical_info ON actors.actor_id = biographical_info.actor_id;
SELECT role_name, show_title, genre FROM roles JOIN tv_shows ON roles.show_id = tv_shows.show_id ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT season_number, episodes_count, show_title FROM seasons JOIN tv_shows ON seasons.show_id = tv_shows.show_id WHERE season_number = 1;
